name: Makati Modern Condo
description: A luxurious modern condo unit located in the heart of Makati City, perfect for urban living with easy access to shopping centers and business districts.

name: Baguio City Vacation House
description: A beautiful vacation house located in the cool and scenic city of Baguio, with a spacious garden and a stunning mountain view.

name: Cebu Beachfront Villa
description: A luxurious beachfront villa in Mactan, Cebu, offering stunning ocean views and direct beach access, ideal for those seeking a tropical lifestyle.

name: Davao Family Home
description: A cozy family home in a peaceful neighborhood of Davao City, perfect for raising a family with nearby schools and parks.

name: Tagaytay Hillside Retreat
description: A serene hillside retreat in Tagaytay with breathtaking views of Taal Volcano, offering a perfect getaway from the bustling city life.

name: Boracay Beach Resort
description: A stunning beachfront resort property located on the world-famous White Beach in Boracay, ideal for business or personal use.

name: Iloilo Heritage House
description: A charming heritage house showcasing traditional Filipino architecture, situated in the vibrant city of Iloilo.

name: Bohol Countryside Villa
description: A picturesque villa surrounded by lush greenery in Panglao, Bohol, just a short drive from the famous beaches.
